Text: I downloaded it and it comes out as an AVI file but I only get audio.  Anything I need to download so I can get video too?
Lukion, try VLC player (http://www.videolan.org/vlc/). It has most of the popular codecs built in.
Or try GOM Player, it is even better than VLC :D
Love this New Sitcom.. Pilot was on Channel 4 yesterday.. brilliant :P
good show...too bad greedy writers had to strike & kill any momentum it had going
C'MON, WHERE's episode NINE?  It's been out since Monday!
Many thanks, great programme, hows the quality?
Or, you can try downloading the CCCP and solve all your codec problems.
